entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: The recent communication on the Bitcoin Development Mailing List highlights a request for transparency and acknowledgment of legitimate concerns raised within the community. The discussion is centered around a tweet posted by user nsvrn, which can be found at [this link](https://x.com/kanzure/status/1766888650069967053). The core of the message appeals to the community members, specifically targeting Ava Chow, to ensure that there's an open dialogue regarding the issues mentioned. This call for transparency underlines the importance of clear communication and addressing concerns directly, reflecting a broader need within the development community for openness and responsiveness to feedback.
